name: Real Racer
description:
REAL RACER

Speed, ability and sense of play that really drive!
Impressive graphics, mobile optimized controls, 15 super race cars and 12 different countires highway to play!

GAME PLAY
Break, nitrous, headlights and G-Sensor control
Pass the cars with highspeed and get more nitrous
Collect coins to unlock new cars and new countries
Change car's colors for free
Make the longest distance to earn coins
Live experience of rain and snow


You can contribute to developing Real Racing by voting and comments.
